channel.title: We Talk Nerd Podcast
channel.description: Tune in as Brandon, Jared and Andrew talk about current nerd culture. Every week we dive into subjects like games, movies, tv and more!
channel.itunes:keywords: Gaming, Movies, TV, News, Nerd, Culture

item.title: Shadow of Podcast
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We talk Destiny 2 (of course), new movies, and Shadow of War
item.itunes:subtitle: We talk Destiny 2 (of course), new movies, and Shadow of War
item.description: We talk Destiny 2 (of course), new movies, and Shadow of War

item.title: How About Them Betas?
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about the recent betas. With of course the weekly Destiny and WoW/PUBG stuff. Oh and we play 20 questions again.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we talk about the recent betas. With of course the weekly Destiny and WoW/PUBG stuff. Oh and we play 20 questions again.
item.description: This week we talk about the recent betas. With of course the weekly Destiny and WoW/PUBG stuff. Oh and we play 20 questions again.

item.title: We Are Terrible At 20 Questions.
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: This week we bring you the latest news, go over destiny 2 some more, and then play 20 questions. Spoiler alert... its terrible.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we bring you the latest news, go over destiny 2 some more, and then play 20 questions. Spoiler alert... its terrible.
item.description: This week we bring you the latest news, go over destiny 2 some more, and then play 20 questions. Spoiler alert... its terrible.

item.title: Destiny 2 and some more Destiny 2
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: Brief news and then we unleash the beast on Destiny 2.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brief news and then we unleash the beast on Destiny 2.
item.description: Brief news and then we unleash the beast on Destiny 2.

item.title: Just the Two of Us
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We are down a man due to the hurricanes and we have a power outage at the end of the recording... fun! Destiny 2 next week!
item.itunes:subtitle: We are down a man due to the hurricanes and we have a power outage at the end of the recording... fun! Destiny 2 next week!
item.description: We are down a man due to the hurricanes and we have a power outage at the end of the recording... fun! Destiny 2 next week!

item.title: It's Rabbids Season!
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: This week we review Mario x Rabbids, talk about the future of Mass Effect, what games we are looking forward to and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we review Mario x Rabbids, talk about the future of Mass Effect, what games we are looking forward to and more!
item.description: This week we review Mario x Rabbids, talk about the future of Mass Effect, what games we are looking forward to and more!

item.title: Gamescom... more like Lamescom
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: A quick run down of some Gamescom news, review the Defenders, Game of Thrones and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: A quick run down of some Gamescom news, review the Defenders, Game of Thrones and more!
item.description: A quick run down of some Gamescom news, review the Defenders, Game of Thrones and more!

item.title: Space, Survival, and Leaks (Oh My!)
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: Week 2 of the We Talk Nerd podcast. This week we talk about what we would like to see in a N64 classic, weekly updates on Destiny 2 and PUBG news, and we discuss the Defenders and Game of Thrones.
item.itunes:subtitle: Week 2 of the We Talk Nerd podcast. This week we talk about what we would like to see in a N64 classic, weekly updates on Destiny 2 and PUBG news, and we discuss the Defenders and Game of Thrones.
item.description: Week 2 of the We Talk Nerd podcast. This week we talk about what we would like to see in a N64 classic, weekly updates on Destiny 2 and PUBG news, and we discuss the Defenders and Game of Thrones.

item.title: A New Hope.... for Podcasts
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: Our first podcast into the world of nerd culture. We talk about games movies and more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Our first podcast into the world of nerd culture. We talk about games movies and more.
